entries.arrived_at_loc: This is right in the path the Imperial scum is taking to get to the debris before us. Don't let anything get by pilot!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.first_attack: The Empire is sending everything they have, this will get rough! We're trying to get reinforcements to you but for now, it's in your hands pilot.
entries.found_loc: We need to buy the recovery team time, proceed to this location.
entries.mission_complete: General Ufwol: < Amazing work pilot! The recovery team is done and safely out of there. Get back to base for some well earned celebration. >
entries.outofrange: General Ufwol: < You're too far away from the enemies route, they will get past you if you don't get back quickly! >
entries.outofrange_failed: General Ufwol: < Our recovery team is being annihilated! Get out of there while there's still time! >
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: The amount of Imperial forces heading your way is frightening. Fortunately, we have the best the Alliance can offer in their way, you!
entries.quest_location_d: You're in a dangerous area of this dangerous system and the Imperial forces are on their way, full throttle. Prepare yourself and make the Crimson Phoenix and Alliance proud!
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: This is the waypoint to intercept the oncoming Imperial forces from. Don't stray from it too far or enemy fighters may slip past you.
entries.title: Endor system: Protect the Rebel recovery team.
entries.title_d: Good job pilot. Now we want the debris of that new ship that you destroyed so that we can find weaknesses in its construction. We have a recovery team on its way to collect it but unfortunately the Empire is sending a large force of their fighters to prevent our success. We need you to buy our recovery team enough time to complete their mission.
entries.trans_update: General Ufwol: < The recovery team is %DI percent done. Hang in there pilot, we're counting on you! >
entries.transmission_received: General Ufwol: < The recovery team got all the debris, they are preparing to pull out, just a few more seconds! >
entries.transmission_start: General Ufwol: < The recovery team has started the operation. They estimate they need about six minutes to complete the task. >
